content: learn a fun new tunisian crochet stitch while making this cowl in a super cozy yarn by combining just three tunisian crochet stitches you can create a tunisian crochet cowl that looks very similar to the traditional waffle stitch you can use a recommended hook size for the yarn you choose but i recommend using a larger hook to make it easier to create the post stitches when making your first cowl this is the perfect crochet project to carry with you on the go or work on while enjoying television or listening to music the pdf includes full-color picture tutorial at the end for easy printing skill level intermediate crochet pattern sizes one size languages available english **materials** required yarn king cole superfine alpaca chunky category #5 bulky yardage between 190 and 200 yards meterage between 173 74 and 182 88 meters hooks us 13 0 - 9 mm gauges 12 stitches x 12 row = 4 inches join confidently crochet with creations by courtney https //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt for crochet alongs pattern sneak peeks and more
